items.sentence: Why don\'t you come inside and we can talk about it?
I\'d appreciate it if you wouldn\'t do that anymore.
You aren\'t really going to argue with Tom, are you?
You aren\'t really planning on helping Tom, are you?
You can hear the news on the radio at nine o\'clock.
You can easily identify Tom because he is very tall.
I wonder if Tom would really do something like that.
I wonder whether or not I should tell Tom the truth.
I wonder whether or not Tom ever gives Mary flowers.
I wonder whether or not Tom really needs to do that.
Thanks a lot for all the things you\'ve done for me.
Tom tried to remember where he had put his passport.
Tom wants to know how long you plan to be in Boston.
Tom was only three years old when he came to Boston.
Tom was surprised when Mary asked him out on a date.
Tom would like to become a simultaneous interpreter.
I don\'t think Tom knows what Mary\'s blood type is.
The police think that Tom has killed several people.
The possibility that Tom might do that worried Mary.
We had to shut the window because of the mosquitoes.
I didn\'t understand French when I first moved here.
I didn\'t use to like wine, but now I like it a lot.
I didn\'t want to say anything, but I had no choice.
I don\'t even know how to say "thank you" in French.
Get something to eat and have a good night\'s sleep.
I have eaten at Chuck\'s Diner on several occasions.
I have more than one friend who can\'t speak French.
He gave an explanation about why he had been absent.
He left the house without so much as saying goodbye.
He made up his mind to write in his diary every day.
I don\'t think Tom will want to go drinking with us.
I don\'t want anything to jeopardize our friendship.
I don\'t know when I\'ll get around to visiting you.
I don\'t think I\'ve heard that word in a long time.
Please give me a little more time to think about it.
Tom spent his summer vacation at his grandmother\'s.
He\'s learning French so he can get a better salary.
How did you know that Tom wouldn\'t show up on time?
How did you learn that Tom wasn\'t living in Boston?
Tom asked Mary to help him, but she didn\'t want to.
Could you do me a favor and babysit my kids tonight?
I don\'t know Tom well enough to ask him to do that.
I figured you wouldn\'t want Tom to know about this.
I can\'t leave yet. I still have a few things to do.
I can\'t let you drink by yourself. Let me join you.
I didn\'t feel very well, but I went to work anyway.
I didn\'t know that Tom could write Chinese so well.
Tom doesn\'t deserve the salary they\'re giving him.
Was your high school\'s basketball team a good team?
We all want to know why you weren\'t here yesterday.
